ygData.subject: RE: Runed Bone Fork (call for a spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: thats him yes.... for once i was hoping he d drop his common drop of the collar so i could sell it and he had the fork hehe , but it is the collar guy
ygData.messageBody:
thats him yes.... for once i was hoping he'd drop his common drop of the
collar so i could sell it and he had the fork hehe , but it is the collar
guy

> -----Original Message-----
> From: JasonF [SMTP:JasonF@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 10:55 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Runed Bone Fork (call for a spoiler)
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> Is this the same Squire that drops the Collar of Undead Protection?
>
> Crier Sharpsong - 34th song bard on Fennin Ro
>
>
> > in upper guk, the squire if i remember correctly. i camped that
> > SOB so long
> > and hadnt gotten a stupid fork, that and the troll belt. And as soon as
> i
> > leave, my buddies are running to do a corpse retrieval to lower
> > guk and got
> > both the fork and belt (warden) for me. Talk about luck hehe.
> >
> > and the other night i was coming back from lower guk and killed the
> squire
> > and he had a fork on him, did a shout to the zone of a free fork, sadly
> it
> > rotted away since i allready had one
> >
> > Minkin
> > Sol ro
> > lev 36 questing fool
>
